analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol)

Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#263-291) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol)

Crowdsale.beneficiary should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#236-239)
Crowdsale.endTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#253-254)
Crowdsale.priceTokenWei should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#249)
Crowdsale.startTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#250)
Crowdsale.tokensForSale should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#244-247)
Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#230)
Token.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#229)
Token.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol#229-230)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x9c838f01bc4dc62ec17e1cebc82a356af60b7983.sol:
